summary: The diff implements REQ-7 by changing the text color of the company name, tagline, and description paragraph in the HeroSection component to black (using Tailwind's `text-black` class). All three target elements are updated in `frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx`. The changes are confined to the HeroSection component, and no files under `frontend/src/hooks/` or `frontend/src/components/ui` were modified. CTA button styles are unchanged.
